item.description:
Backpacking Coast-to-Coast Across Scotland  (Potluck & Slideshow)

with Philip Werner - a Random Group of Hikers Assistant Organizer!

Tuesday / March 15, 2011

6:30 PM Potluck, 7:15 PM Slideshow

AMC Auditorium
4 Joy Street
Boston MA

Last May, Philip Werner hiked coast-to-coast across Scotland as part of an annual, noncompetitive, event called The Great Outdoors Challenge (TGO Challenge). Philip planned his own cross-country route from the east coast to the west, a distance of 170 miles, backpacking through the heart of the Scottish Highlands.

Participation in the TGO Challenge requires a high degree of competence in navigation, survival techniques, backcountry camping and hill walking. A maximum of 15 days is allowed for the crossing and entrants must have previous hill walking experience in Scotland, although exceptions are made for overseas participants.

If you’ve ever been interested in hiking or mountaineering in Scotland, you should come see this presentation. Philip will describe his route planning process, including Scottish geography and climate, share his experiences backpacking the route and participating in the TGO Challenge, and show gorgeous pictures of Scotland’s mountains, waterfalls, and landscape.

If you plan to attend, please RSVP to Julie LePage at AMCBostonSlideshows@gmail.com.

For those who wish to participate in the potluck at 6:30, feel free to use the following guidelines: Last names beginning with A-J bring a main dish or side dish, last names beginning with K-Z bring an appetizer or side dish. Homemade dishes are great, store bought goodies & takeout are equally welcome:) Plates, bowls, cups, cutlery, napkins and drink pitchers will be supplied. The auditorium has a kitchen if you need to do any re-warming or prep (stovetop, oven, microwave, sink, fridge, etc).

Subway Directions: Take the Red Line T to Park Street Station and walk through the Boston Common uphill towards the State House & Beacon Street. Continue walking up Joy Street, which runs along the left side of the State House at a set of lights. The Auditorium is #4 Joy Street (just before the AMC Headquarters Building, on the left side).
item.name: Backpacking Coast-to-Coast Across Scotland (Potluck & Slideshow)
